name: ASCII Tag
description:
Controls: Click/Tap to click buttons   &   Move mouse/finger to move the green circle

Avoid the red cube for as long as possible! As you progress the speed will increase and the game will become progressively more difficult! 

KEY:

 - Player 

 - Enemy (Will chase the player at a speed that increases as time progresses)

 - Ramp (Only player can move from the dark side to the light side but not back)

 - Ramp side-view (What the ramp would look like from the side)

{Running on ZeroTech OS - 2022}
